caption.p: Simpson diversity index for historical (white boxes) and recent (gray boxes) inventories in six plant communities. “Sil.”: siliceous; “subalp.”: subalpine. Black dots represent the mean values, the black line is the median, and boxes are limited by 1st and 3rd quartiles. Stars above the boxes indicate a significant change between historical and recent inventories, according to a pairwise Wilcoxon–Mann–Whitney test: * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01.
